name: carbonate
description: Carbonate - A chemistry-themed real-time chat application with socket.io and React

scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start:with-frontend --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
